metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4600 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Open Ticket Request System(OTRS) Help Desk 2.4.x before 2.4.14, 3.0.x before 3.0.16, and 3.1.x before3.1.10, when Firefox or Opera is used, allows remote attackers to injectarbitrary web script or HTML via an e-mail message body with nested HTMLtags.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4600` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 6.0.5-1
otrs2 - 6.0.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.5-1').
